templates.template:
<%@ page language="java" contentType="text/html; charset=${encoding}" pageEncoding="${encoding}"%> <%@ taglib prefix="c" uri="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core" %> <%@ taglib prefix="fmt" uri="http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/fmt" %> <c:set var="conPath" value="$${pageContext.request.contextPath }" /> <fmt:requestEncoding value="utf-8"/> <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=${encoding}"> <title>Title</title> <link href="${conPath }/css/.css" rel="stylesheet"> <script>
</script> </head> <body> ${cursor} </body> </html>
